name: ButtonClicker (really_cant_be_that_hard)
description:
My entry to the 8 bits to infinity #36 Mouse Jam 2

I only started using Godot4.0  and remade a game, I programmed in Excel when I was an intern 5 years ago.
My pixelart needs definetely some improvements but at least I can say it's mine ^^

Enjoy clicking buttons, but beware, the time may chase you!

Diversifiers:
    - One Button
